thread.title: U.S. Faces Fight in Efforts to Seize $250 Million Yacht tied to 1MDB Scandal

author: Ben Otto
title: U.S. Faces Fight in Efforts to Seize $250 Million Yacht tied to 1MDB Scandal
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesiaâ€”A potentially prolonged custody battle is unfolding over a $250 million yacht allegedly connected to the 1MDB global scandal, with lawyers moving on multiple fronts to block the U.S. from seizing the boat.
The moves could upend a U.S. win against a Malaysian financier the Justice Department alleges is a central player in a $4.5 billion scandal that has spawned investigations in several nations.
Last... RELATED VIDEO Investigators Search Yacht Seized in 1MDB Scandal WSJ video shows the luxury yacht Equanimity, linked to a $4.5 billion fraud case brought by the U.S. Department of Justice, being searched Thursday in the waters off Bali, Indonesia.
